long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This enhancement for Joblogic adds additional features and functionality designed to improve upon Joblogic's job management software.

This is a paid for enhancement, with the following features:

• Create Direct Debits and collect automated payments (via GoCardless)
• Spread one invoice over multiple direct debit invoices
• Show a warning when a customer is on hold
• Display the full part number, custom reference and description in parts list on quotes, jobs and purchase order
• Create a deposit invoice with remaining value being spread over the duration of the PPM Contract
• Change field names and display dropdown boxes for fields (instead of free text)

More features are continuously being added to enhanced businesses use of Joblogic.

Note: This enhancement is not supported by Joblogic directly.
